property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the MojikumiUiPreference &#40;a Document or Application).

property.name: lineEndAllOneHalfEm
property.shortdesc: If true, uses half-width spacing for all characters.

property.name: oneEmIndentLineEndUkeOneHalfEm
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one space and uses line end uke one half space.

property.name: oneOrOneHalfEmIndentLineEndUkeOneHalfEm
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one full or half space and uses line end uke one half space.

property.name: oneOrOneHalfEmIndentLineEndAllOneEm
property.shortdesc: If true, Uses full-witdh spacing for all characters except the last character in the line, which uses either full- or half-width spacing.

property.name: oneEmIndentLineEndAllOneEm
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one full space and uses full-width spacing for all characters.

property.name: oneEmIndentLineEndAllNoFloat
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one full space and uses no float for all characters.

property.name: oneEmIndentLineEndUkeNoFloat
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one full space and uses line end uke no float.

property.name: oneOrOneHalfEmIndentLineEndUkeNoFloat
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one half space or one full space and uses line end uke no float.

property.name: oneEmIndentLineEndAllOneHalfEm
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one full space and uses half-width spacing for all characters.

property.name: lineEndAllOneEm
property.shortdesc: If true, uses full-width spacing for all characters.

property.name: lineEndUkeNoFloat
property.shortdesc: If true, uses line end uke no float.

property.name: oneOrOneHalfEmIndentLineEndPeriodOneEm
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one or one-half space and uses full-width spacing for punctuation and for the last character in the line.

property.name: oneEmIndentLineEndPeriodOneEm
property.shortdesc: If true, indents lines one space and uses full-width spacing for punctuation and for the last character in the line.

property.name: lineEndPeriodOneEm
property.shortdesc: If true, uses full-width spacing for punctuation and for the last character in the line.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the MojikumiUiPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
